meanings.definition: A tropical Asian shrub or small tree.
meanings.sent1: The gambir in the garden provides shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: Many birds like to nest in the branches of the gambir.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the gambir as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The gambir stood tall like a guardian in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the gambir rustled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A yellowish astringent extract obtained from the leaves of this plant, used in tanning and dyeing.
meanings.sent1: The tanner applied gambir to the leather to make it more durable.
meanings.sent2: The artist mixed gambir with other dyes to create a unique shade.
meanings.sent3: The tailor accidentally spilled gambir on the fabric, creating a new design.
meanings.sent4: The gambir infused the material with a golden hue, like sunshine captured.
meanings.sent5: The scent of gambir filled the workshop, reminding everyone of the forest.
